item.title: Client options
item.description: Option WithDSN() WithDSNMailReturnType() WithDSNRcptNotifyType() WithHELO() Option Signature 1 type Option func(*Client) error Client Option are functions that can be used as optional arguments for the NewClient() methods to override the default vaules of the returned Client. WithDSN() Signature 1 func WithDSN() Option Example 1 2 3 4 5 package main import ( "github.com/wneessen/go-mail" "log" ) func main() { c, err := mail.NewClient("mail.example.com", mail.WithDSN()) if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } } The WithDSN option function tells the Client to request DSNs (if the server supports it) as described in RFC 1891.
